ISSUE.TITLE: On Linux: A warning on a file that doesn't exist - dataSettings.json
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.50 Steps to reproduce the problem: See this forum topic https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/93439/is-it-a-bug-a-warning-on-a-file-that-doesnt-exist I suspect it's just related to the code / bash command used for Linux (CheckPermissionsInUnix), because the code for Windows does properly handle it - i.e. no "warning on a file that doesn't exist." private static bool CheckPermissionsInWindows(... if (!(fileProvider.FileExists(path) || fileProvider.DirectoryExists(path))) { return true; }
